last_episode_to_air.name: Operation Thunderbolt
last_episode_to_air.overview: Could this finally be it for Daniel and Dr Glennis?

name: Sick Note
overview: When Daniel Glass is misdiagnosed with a fatal disease he begins to notice how everyone around him treats him better. But then he finds out he was misdiagnosed by the most incompetent oncologist on Earth and now he has a big decision to make: come clean and go back to his old rubbish life, or keep pretending to be ill.

episodes.name: Queen Of Hearts
episodes.overview: A lie spirals way out of control for down-on-his-luck Daniel.

episodes.name: Playing Ball
episodes.overview: Daniel's regretting his lie but having a body to deal with means he's got very little time to dwell on it.

episodes.name: Janina Kolkiewicz
episodes.overview: Daniel's already got a lot on his mind but life's about to get a whole lot worse when Linda suggests to Kenny that he becomes the new face of We Cover Insurance.

episodes.name: The Golden Grain
episodes.overview: Finally, it looks like Daniel and Dr Glennis have everything covered and now they can focus on making Daniel's fake illness more believable.

episodes.name: Airplane Mode
episodes.overview: A claustrophobic game of cat and mouse ensues, with multiple parties all attempting to outwit each other to uncover the truth. But how far will Dr Glennis go to stop the truth from coming out?

episodes.name: Chicken Soup
episodes.overview: Officer Hayward is on the prowl, just a hair's breadth away from uncovering the truth, while Becca suspects foul play.

episodes.name: Frantisek Kotzwara
episodes.overview: The lies keep coming as Daniel is in serious trouble and things are looking pretty messy.

episodes.name: New Balls
episodes.overview: Daniel's online gaming buddy, Will5000 stirs up a whole lot of trouble when he rocks up at Daniel's work threatening to spill all their secrets.

episodes.name: Stay Hydrated
episodes.overview: Daniel and Dr Glennis need cash to silence Will so meet a dealer to sell Daniel's drugs. But the meeting is not what they expected.

episodes.name: Braking Bad
episodes.overview: Dr Glennis makes a dangerous mistake as Daniel chases after Will. Katerina gets a surprise visitor.

episodes.name: Constable Polly
episodes.overview: Convinced Daniel and Dr Glennis are murderers, Officer Hayward dresses up as a woman to spy on them. When he gets unwittingly caught up in their race to catch Will, his undercover ok turns into a mission to track down Dr Glennis helmet cam.

episodes.name: My Two Dads
episodes.overview: Daniel and Dr Glennis need to flee the country, but there is one thing holding them back. Daniel's passport is stuck at the police station. To get to it, Dr Glennis must pose as Daniel's dad but it is no easy task.

episodes.name: The Loneliness of the Middle Distance Runner
episodes.overview: Becca starts to wonder if Will_5000 was telling the truth.

episodes.name: Operation Thunderbolt
episodes.overview: Could this finally be it for Daniel and Dr Glennis?
